Key Match Events: Luka Doncic scored 14 points in the first quarter to help the Mavericks to a 30-22 lead
Dallas maintained their momentum in the second half and stretched their advantage to 82-52 on Doncic’s free throw with six minutes and five seconds to play in the third quarter
Post-Match Reflections: Luka Doncic: "Today was real fun. We were guarding everybody, defending, rebounding, playing with a lot of pace. So that’s fun for me."
Miscellaneous Highlights: Daniel Gafford scored a season-high 18 points for Dallas
Kyrie Irving added 17 points for Dallas
Dereck Lively II had 11 points and 11 rebounds for Dallas
Orlando made just eight of 41 three-point attempts
Orlando are currently without All-Star forward Paolo Banchero, who has an abdominal muscle injury and is set to miss at least the next four weeks
